messages.message:
I'm seeing failures of a couple different tests:

• loginless-sample-results and run-public-app - @Travis is already on this with this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57877). Do you think we should move these fixes into a separate PR or will this PR be merged soon? What ended up being the root cause here?
• documents-grid - @Udit were you able to look into this? Would be good to know what the root cause was as well and why PR tests did not catch it
• nested-field-editor - @Udit I know you made some changes to this last week, looks like it's failing consistently now
For loginless the issue is the W2/US Bank Statement apps are no longer on the homepage (the preview apps at bottom). My fix is look for those apps on the public market place)
my current PR with the fixes is failing a ton of tests mysteriously.
about to try one more time and then I can split off another PR
@danny.lan has also been looking into fixing loginless-sample-results and run-public-app

I cherrypicked your fixes @Travis for loginless-sample-results and run-public-app here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57927) to make my PR pass, so the fix is already on master :sunglasses:
@Udit and I fixed the doc-grid and nested-editor tests. Passing in my PR (just need CI now…)
